question: Which state / UT has recently launched online issue of low denomination Non Judicial Stamps?
explanation:
The UT of Puducherry has recently launched online service of issuing low denomination non judicial e-stamps.
This service is aimed to prevent public crowding at authorised collection centres. The UT government has signed an MoU with Stock Holding Corporation of India Ltd (SHCIL) for collection of stamp duty in the Registration Department.
